mapper.sql: exec_id, project_id, version, flow_id, status, submit_user, submit_time, update_time, start_time, end_time, enc_type, executor_id
mapper.select:
select scvb.meaning as meaning,exec_id, project_id, execution_flows.version, execution_flows.flow_id, execution_flows.status, execution_flows.submit_user, execution_flows.submit_time, execution_flows.update_time, execution_flows.start_time, execution_flows.end_time, execution_flows.enc_type, execution_flows.executor_id ,projects.name as project_name, hwf.theme_id,hwf.description,
from execution_flows,projects,sys_code_b scb,sys_code_value_b scvb,sys_code_value_tl scv,hdispatch_workflow hwf where execution_flows.project_id=projects.id and scb.CODE_ID = scvb.CODE_ID and execution_flows.status=scvb.value and scvb.CODE_VALUE_ID = scv.CODE_VALUE_ID and scb.CODE = 'HDISPATCH.JOB_STATUS' and SCV.LANG = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and projects.name=hwf.name and ('Y'=hasPermission(hwf.theme_id,#{request.userId},'Y',NULL) OR 'Y'=hasPermission(hwf.theme_id,#{request.userId},NULL,'Y'))
and execution_flows.start_time > #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and hwf.description like CONCAT('%',#{description},'%')
and execution_flows.flow_id like CONCAT('%',#{flowId},'%')
order by exec_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into execution_flows (exec_id, project_id, version, flow_id, status, submit_user, submit_time, update_time, start_time, end_time, enc_type, executor_id, flow_data) values (#{execId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{submitUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{encType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flowData,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update execution_flows set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, submit_user = #{submitUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enc_type = #{encType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, executor_id = #{executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flow_data = #{flowData,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where exec_id = #{execId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update execution_flows set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, submit_user = #{submitUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enc_type = #{encType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, executor_id = #{executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where exec_id = #{execId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
